name: mapred-propertypath
short_description: Sometimes, the input-paths of a mapreduce programs are complex. Files and directories are mixed together, it is difficult and boring to write  and examine the input paths. This project aims to create a jar to help control the input paths. The basic method is adding a property-file which contains some input-paths and filter-conditions, and the jar generates the input-paths for MR automatically and correctly.
summary: to create a jar to help controle input-paths of mapreduce
